name: Aaron's Famous Vegetarian Nachos
author: Andrea Parker
summary: This plate of nachos is very satisfying and craveable. I can eat them once a week. You can add whatever toppings you like, but this is our favorite. Also good topped with sliced pepperoncini or diced jalapeno.
ingredients: 1 (7.75 ounce) can jalapeno salsa (such as El Pato®)
1 (8 ounce) package shredded pepper Jack cheese
directions: Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Line a rimmed baking sheet with aluminum foil
Combine refried beans and salsa in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until blended and heated through, about 5 minutes
Arrange tortilla chips on the baking sheet
Spoon refried bean mixture over chips
Sprinkle pepper Jack cheese, green bell pepper, and onion on top
Cook under the preheated broiler until cheese is melted, 3 to 5 minutes
